DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy irreversible electroporation ( IRE ) unresectable Lymph Node Metastases .
DOC.brief_title: Irreversible Electroporation ( IRE ) For Unresectable Lymph Node Metastases ( Close Nerve )
DOC.detailed_description: By enrol patient unresectable Lymph Node Metastases adapt enrolled criterion , study document first time safety short long term efficacy percutaneous IRE unresectable Lymph Node Metastases .
DOC.criteria: Lymph Node Metastases diagnose positive biopsy noninvasive criterion , Not suitable surgical resection , Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) score 01 , A prothrombin time ratio > 50 % , Platelet count > 80x10^9/L , Ability patient stop anticoagulant antiplatelet therapy seven day prior seven day post NanoKnife procedure , Able comprehend willing sign write informed consent form ( ICF ) , Have life expectancy least 3 month . Cardiac insufficiency , ongoing coronary artery disease arrhythmia , Any active implant device ( eg Pacemaker ) , Women pregnant woman childbearing potential use acceptable method contraception , Have receive treatment investigational agent/ procedure within 30 day prior treatment NanoKnifeâ„¢ LEDC System , Are opinion Investigator unable comply visit schedule protocol evaluation .
